nodes.bodyText: Should we keep this as Throwable or find the specific Exception(s)?

These will throw a ClassNotFoundException at runtime if missing, however if I try to catch it here the compiler thinks it's not possible won't compile.
The best we can do is change these to Exception, which is a bit better than Throwable

The if statement, not sure way I worded that way. Changing to "Check"
